docs.lead_paragraph: Gambian authorities have released 98 prisoners, mostly from the notorious Mile 2 prison, an Interior Ministry spokesman said on Friday, as the country seeks to turn a page on the authoritarian era of ousted former president Yahya Jammeh.

headline.main: Gambia Frees Nearly 100 Prisoners From Jammeh Era
headline.print_headline: Gambia Frees Nearly 100 Prisoners From Jammeh Era

docs.snippet: Gambian authorities have released 98 prisoners, mostly from the notorious Mile 2 prison, an Interior Ministry spokesman said on Friday, as the country seeks to turn a page on the authoritarian era of ousted former president Yahya Jammeh....

docs.lead_paragraph: Two years after a deadly riot led to promises to fix long-standing problems at a Nebraska prison, officials were struggling Friday to respond to criticism after inmates again seized control of a cellblock in an uprising that left two of them dead.

headline.main: Nebraska Prison Scrutinized After 2nd Deadly Riot in 2 Years

docs.lead_paragraph: A judge has declared unconstitutional a recently-adopted policy favored by President Donald Trump that allows Miami-Dade County jails to hold immigrants who face deportation.

docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. President Donald Trump and Dutch anti-Islam election candidate Geert Wilders are portrayed in headscarves worn by Muslim women in a protest exhibition in Amsterdam to raise money for women's rights organizations.
